    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddCustomerDialog
    Dialog for adding a new user.
    AddProductDialog
    Dialog for adding a new product to inventory.
    AuthenticationDialog
    Dialog for user authentication (Sign In / Sign Up / Guest).
    Beverages
    Concrete class for Beverage products.
    CartItem
    Represents a single item (a product and its quantity) in a shopping cart.
    ConsoleHelper
    A static utility class to handle all console input.
    Customer
    Represents a user/customer in the convenience store.
    CustomerController
    Handles all logic for the customer-facing shopping experience.
    CustomerGUI
    Customer shopping interface.
    EditUserDialog
    Dialog for editing user/customer details.
    EmployeeController
    Handles all logic for the employee-facing menu.
    EmployeeGUI
    Employee management interface.
    Food
    Concrete class for Food products.
    GeneralAndSpecialty
    Represents a General or Specialty product (e.g., cigarette, electronics).
    HouseholdAndPet
    Represents a Household or Pet product.
    Inventory
    Manages the store's inventory, which is split into two lists: one for perishable goods and one for non-perishable goods.
    MainWindow
    Main application window for the Convenience Store Management System.
    MembershipCard
    Represents a customer's membership card, used for accumulating and redeeming points.
    NonPerishableProduct
    An abstract subclass for products that do not expire.
    PaymentDialog
    Dialog for handling payment during checkout.
    PerishableProduct
    An abstract subclass for products that can expire.
    Pharmacy
    Concrete class for Pharmacy products.
    Product
    The abstract base class for all products sold in the store.
    ProductSale
    Represents a sale/discount on a product or category.
    SaleManager
    Manages all product sales/discounts in the store.
    StoreController
    The main application class.
    StoreController
    The main application class.
    StoreControllerGUI
    Main GUI controller for the convenience store application.
    StoreDataHandler
    Handles all file I/O for saving and loading data.
    StoreGUI
    Main menu screen for the convenience store.
    StoreSimulation
    The main driver class for the Convenience Store Simulation.
    Toiletries
    Represents a Toiletry product.
    Transaction
    Manages all financial calculations for a single checkout transaction.
    ViewUsersDialog
    Dialog for viewing and managing user accounts.
